comments.body: The need for this check is a bit unfortunate since it makes the api a bit unsafe (kind of tough to tell at a glance that all current uses are safe, though I think they are). Since we have only three valid options, I was wondering if we could replace the two booleans with an enum representing the disconnect state or something. Not too big of a deal since it's internal, but might be worth considering.
@hachikuji Thanks for the review. Updated to use an enum. Can you do another quick review? If it looks ok, I will merge and backport when the tests complete.
